ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] roasted walrus with plum sauce
ygData.msgSnippet: That s why I promptly forgot them, along with being perpetually poor that is. Kit ... From: Vic Matos [mailto:matosvr@theriver.com] Sent: Monday, July 16, 2001
ygData.messageBody:
That's why I promptly forgot them, along with being perpetually poor that
is.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Vic Matos [mailto:matosvr@...]

To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] roasted walrus with plum sauce


Travelers Boots are Lore no drop too but then again we as bards wouldnt
bother with them.

Arud Bastad

om]On Behalf Of Kimes, Dean W.

Weird, are there any other vendor sold items that are No Drop? That's the
first one I've seen.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Monday, July 16, 2001 6:31 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] roasted walrus with plum sauce


Hi all,

Hunting is Skyshrine the other day and I stopped in
the bakery to seewhat was for sale. Couple of drop
spells and a nifty sounding item: Roasted walrus with
plum sauce. First It is LORE, NO DROP and costs
105pp.

My guess is this is some quest item. Can anyone tell
me what? I've seen bard charm used to complete the
spider leg quest in SS and would like to give this one
a try...
